item.title: Why and how to test Rake tasks in your Rails application
item.description: Most of us write some Rake tasks and completely forget about them. In fact, we rarely give any love to our Rake tasks. Well, I think it's time we change that. Let's see why and how we can test our Rake tasks. But, why? Yes, it's a legit question. You can always say “I already tested my classes!". But, there are couple of reasons why you should always test your Rake tasks:
